entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
